- The brand per se has quite a reputation (both in good and bad ways), thus elevating your CV.

cons:
- If you are being offered a job at this company and are not the kind of people who can handle stress well, brace yourself because you are in for a never-ending workload. This will happen most, if not all, of the time and will render you stressed out and exhausted.

- The management and communication are rather fragmented and lacking. You will meet some people who cannot communicate to save their lives or people who will ask around about everything and pass ridiculous amounts of assignments onto you.
- There are some condescending, disrespectful individuals who will make you lose the joy of working here.
- If you are unfortunate, you will be involved in some dramas or politics.
